listitem.para: Outputs the least recent (oldest) thing that was enqueued onto a queue with QUEUE. This value is removed from the queue.

listitem.programlisting:
MAKE "myqueue [] QUEUE "myqueue 1 QUEUE "myqueue 2 QUEUE "myqueue 3 SHOW :myqueue [1 2 3]
SHOW DEQUEUE "myqueue 1
SHOW :myqueue [2 3]
SHOW DEQUEUE "myqueue 2
SHOW :myqueue [3]
